review: Good product, much better then the Google Chromecast.
author: Charles Spiteri

review: Love love love this stick !  Great picture quality, vast array of things to watch and what a bargain!
author: Ravyn

review: Works great!!!!  Super easy to set up too!
author: C. Hilliard

review: Enjoying a lot  of free movies so far, and the ability to access other pay per view features is another good option.
author: Kristi R.

review: Great. Easy to set  up and use
author: Tammy Van Kuren

review: The control on this device is horrible. It gets stuck in an auto repeat mode. Press any direction arrow and it goes all the way across the on-screen keyboard! Try and search for something with that !!! Removing and re-inserting batteries usually helps. I tried this device too late to return so I guess I'm out the cost of the product.
author: Donald B.

review: Exceeded expectations.  Very powerful device for its size.
author: Michael H. Weinmann

review: I've had no problems what so ever! It works great for netflix, pandora and a lot of other things!
author: Kk
